boardgame.name: Caballeros Guerreros
Hadurak
Warrior Knights
boardgame.description: The Kingdom is in chaos. The King lies dead without an heir, slain by a villainous hand. Will a leader rise up and rally the support of the people, or will the shadow of anarchy spread over the land?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Warrior Knights, each player takes on the role of a Baron vying for control of the Kingdom. Each Baron commands four faithful Nobles who lead his armies into battle. Each Baron seeks to capture cities in order to gain Influence (victory points), which is used to measure his claim to the throne. Barons may also seek to gain advantage by increasing their income, gathering Votes to use at the Assembly, or by amassing Faith, which can be used to gain a measure of control over chance events. Only through cunning strategy and careful diplomacy can a Baron hope to attain victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Warrior Knights has a very clever mechanic. Each player has a selection of tasks they can accomplish each turn, such as move _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; attack, gain political strength, hire mercenaries, and gain religious faith. Only 6 of these are done in any turn. Each player selects 2 tasks for each 1/3 of the game turn. The task cards are then shuffled with all the other players. So each player doesn't know the exact order of play, only which two tasks they will perform in each 1/3 of the game turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition, the game has four special phases that are triggered based on how frequently players are choosing a particular task. Collecting taxes individually, once done often enough, will trigger a taxation phase. Players collecting political power trigger a session of Parliment. When enough players want to hire mercenaries, there is an auction for their services. The flipside is that the more mercenaries that are hired, the more often they want to be paid in the wages phase._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The mixing of these two clever mechanics, choosing tasks but performing them in a random order and triggering the 4 special phases at somewhat unpredictable times makes for a tense game. Players can often be caught short of cash if wages are demanded more frequently than taxes are collected. If the other players all collect political influence, a Parliment might be called when one or two players has only a single vote. These elements of variable turn orders and variable phases give the game a highly addictive quality._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

never played +++++ english version from fantasy flight games +++++ will be shipped insured +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia and australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : direct bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) or cash (by letter) +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly are not cheap (about 19 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped or what´s it´s weight), so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ shipping inside germany costs 8 euros

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG VA18) Warrior Knights is a game of medieval diplomacy, politics, and war. It is playable by 2-6 players in 2-4 hours. A re-design of the 1985 classic, this edition features modernized, streamlined mechanics and gorgeous, high-quality components. Dozens of detailed plastic figures are complemented by a linen-finshed gameboard and cardboard components. Warrior Knights includes: 1 Rulebook (24 pages) 1 Game Board 24 Plastic Nobles (in 6 colors) 24 Plastic Cities 6 Stronghold Cards 24 Noble Cards 36 Event Cards 45 Agenda Cards 66 Mercenary Troop Cards 24 Regular Troops Cards (4 per Baron) 80 Action Cards (12 per Baron and 8 Neutral) 78 Crown Tokens (in 1s and 5s) 40 Vote Tokens (in 1s and 3s) 36 Faith Tokens 40 Influence Tokens (in 1s,3s,and 5s) 28 Casualty Tokens (in 1s and 2s) 21 Breach Tokens (double-sided, in 1s and 2s) 48 Baron Markers (8 for each Baron) 3 Expedition Markers 12 Siege Markers 72 Control Markers (12 for each Baron) 6 Stronghold Tokens (1 per Baron) 1 Chairman of the Assembly Token 1 Head of the Church Token

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. WARRIOR KNIGHTS: $46.59 Fantasy Flight Games Availability: DIRECT ORDER - In stock at supplier. We will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click onthe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Description: Each player takes on the role of one of six powerful Barons vying for control of the Kingdom. Through strategy, politics, and raw force, Barons gain influence over the land. In this struggle for power, will you lay siege to your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s city or try a more perilous assault? Does your strength lie in your military might or in your political power? Will you focus your limited resources on hiring mercenaries, supporting the Church, or gaining the upper hand at the Assembly?
The choice is yours in Warrior Knights.
Fantasy Flight Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s re-envisioning of the classic game of power and politics has arrived! Featuring new stream-lined gameplay, brilliant graphics, and gorgeous components, Warrior Knights is finally available for a new generation of contenders to the throne. For two to six players, playable in two to four hours.
Components:
· Rulebook, game board · 24 plastic nobles · 24 plastic cities · 304 high-quality cards · 386 sturdy cardboard tokens and markers · box approximately 12” x 12” x 2.8” ***************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

ATTENTION: this order contains Both the base game AND the its “grail game” expansion Crown and Glory. The “Crown and Glory” expansion is extremely hard to find. It was a smaller print run and is highly sought after, as it adds content and player options, while amazingly streamlining gameplay at the same time. Mainly,it does it by adding more focus and direction for individual players at the start, and is especially helpful for people who aren’t naturally talkative or savvy right out of the games with an otherwise “blank canvas.” That said, it does not constrain free-wheeling negotiations nor limit skull-duggery options in the least. Once you’ve played Warrior Knights with the expansion, you’ll never play without it again.
This offer includes the Crown and Glory Expansion. Payment in advance. Payment SEPA transfer via IBAN/BIC or paypal (plus fees). Private sale without warranty. Please ask for shipping costs.
